meanings.definition: A large amount or number of something.
meanings.sent1: She had caboodles of toys scattered around her room.
meanings.sent2: There were caboodles of people at the concert last night.
meanings.sent3: The clown car was so tiny, yet it somehow fit caboodles of clowns inside!
meanings.sent4: His excitement was like caboodles of fireworks bursting in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with caboodles of gold coins.

meanings.definition: A collection or group of things.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed caboodles of ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent2: She organized her jewelry into caboodles of colorful boxes.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out caboodles of scarves from his hat.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a library filled with caboodles of stories waiting to be told.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a paradise with caboodles of flowers in full bloom.
